Ğ ĞµĞºĞ¾Ğ¼ĞµĞ½Ğ´ÑƒÑ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼Ñƒ Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ñ ÑƒĞ³Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ» ĞµÑ‰Ñ‘ Ğ½Ğµ Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ½ Ñ‡Ğ°Ñ Ğ·Ğ° Ğ±ĞµÑ‚Ğ° Ğ²ĞµÑ€ÑĞ¸ÑĞ¼Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ» Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ» 2

Theres a reason that this game has been sitting among the highest rated games on this platform since its release. Combining both brain-twisting puzzles and a coherent, enjoyable storyline, I've found myself returning to Portal 2 to replay the story repeatedly. If you've never played, I suggest buying it, as its worth every penny. Not only is the story amazing, but the co-op mode is another story in itself, only deepening the content available. Not enough? The amazing community is regularly pumping content out, and with the Portal: Reloaded mod releasing in a mere month, theres no reason not to pick up the game.

10/10.

Portal 2 is one of the best puzzle games I've ever played. The levels are very well designed, the characters are memorable, the dialogues are humourous, the puzzles can get confusing at times but not impossible to solve, multiplayer is a lot of fun and the story is great especially GLaDOS and Chell's relationship. I absolutely love this game.
portalÄ± beÄŸenmeyen ne bileyim... Starcraft mÄ± oynuyor?

Absolutely fantastic game for all ages. Great storyline, perfect sequel to an already amazing game, good humor, nice engine (good for regular playstyle and speedrunning), sick visuals and atmosphere, the multiplayer mode is very fun (just like the singleplayer mode but with more stupidity - easy to find new friends to play with), extra game mechanics and "hidden" progressive tutorials, mind twisting puzzles and the "Ah ha" moment, and the puzzle editor feature. This feature developed a lot of passion for Portal in the community, and it also encourages players to make their own work, to open up Hammer and build masterpieces, and to mod the game. This keeps a stable community around Portal even after 9 years.
